references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models which underpins many modern generative models.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial theoretical framework for understanding diffusion models by connecting them to stochastic differential equations, advancing theoretical understanding and contributing to model improvement.
This paper introduces DDIM, an improved diffusion model sampling method that offers enhanced speed and controllability, making it significantly relevant to controllable image editing.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work demonstrates the application of diffusion models to generate high-resolution images, showcasing the practical significance and wide applicability of the technique.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art text-to-image diffusion model, demonstrating significant advancements in image generation quality and the integration of language understanding, greatly influencing controllable image editing.
